tests.name: Compiler Tests
tests.setup: sudo apt install software-properties-common -y && sudo add-apt-repository ppa:deadsnakes/ppa -y && sudo apt install python3.10 && curl -sS https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py | python3.10 && pip3.10 install -r requirements.txt && git clone https://github.com/Compiler-Construction-Uni-Freiburg/compiler-tests && cd compiler-tests && gcc -c -g -std=c99 runtime.c
